mapper.insert: insert into manager( username , password , realname , contact ) values( #{username} , #{password} , #{realname} , #{contact} )
mapper.update: update manager set username=#{username} , password=#{password} , realname=#{realname} , contact=#{contact} where managerid=#{managerid}
mapper.select:
select * from manager where 1=1
and ( manager.username like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or manager.realname like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or manager.contact like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
order by managerid desc
limit #{start},#{limit}

SELECT count(1) FROM manager
where 1=1
and ( manager.username like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or manager.realname like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or manager.contact like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
select a.* from manager a where managerid=#{managerid} order by managerid desc

and a.username like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{username}, '%'))
